Description:
This map was made to test your airdribbling abilities and to see how much ball control you have in the air.

This might not be very useful in the game but its more about gaining car/ball control.

I hope to see everyone trying to beat there records and have as much fun as possible.

My personal best height is 1017, and i hope to improve this alot in the future, good luck and have fun airdribbling!!!

If you would like to support me and what I do, consider donating.
paypal.me/iRef123
